title: Sun Transit in the 7th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 7th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, partnerships, marriage, and public dealings come into focus. Authority and self-expression surface strongly in one-to-one relationships, increasing the need to lead or define terms clearly. Spouse or partners may appear dominant, or ego clashes can arise if balance is missing. Business alliances demand transparency and mutual respect. When handled with maturity, this transit supports confident partnerships, decisive negotiations, and a clearer public presence.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Strong need to assert identity in partnerships

closing: This Sun transit highlights partnerships and public identity. With balance and respect, it strengthens alliances and brings confident, mutually beneficial outcomes.
